title: 木牌问题
author: dpy0428
txt_content:
give @p minecraft:sign 1 0 
{BlockEntityTag:{id:"minecraft:sign",
Text4:"{"color":"dark_green","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/scoreboard players tag @p remove ccc"},"text":"$$$"}",
Text3:"{"color":"dark_green","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/scoreboard players add @p[tag=ccc] huobi 1"},"text":"10月币"}",
Text2:"{"color":"dark_green","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/clear @p[tag=ccc] minecraft:emerald 0 1 "},"text":"出售绿宝石"}",
Text1:"{"color":"dark_green","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/scoreboard players tag @p add ccc {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:emerald"}}"},"text":"$$$"}"
}}复制代码其中因为使用了/scoreboard players tag @p add ccc {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:emerald"}}复制代码导致出错，木牌会变成没字的牌子
将
{SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:emerald"}}复制代码部分删除，木牌能正常运作。求解决

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
上一条进审核了，但这么宝贵的抢答时间我怎么能错过…
麻烦版主不通过上一条的审核谢谢【跑
{SelectedItem:{id:\\\"minecraft:emerald\\\"}}

（如果这条也进审核那就很尴尬了

replies.author: 柘木铃
replies.txt_content:
Text1:"{\"text\":\"出售绿宝石\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"scoreboard players tag @p add ccc {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:emerald}}\"},\"color\":\"dark_green\"}"
试试这个？我也不怎么懂这个

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
give @p minecraft:sign 1 0 
{BlockEntityTag:{id:"minecraft:sign",
Text4:"{\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/scoreboard players tag @p remove ccc\"},\"text\":\"$$$\"}",
Text3:"{\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/scoreboard players add @p[tag=ccc] huobi 1\"},\"text\":\"10月币\"}",
Text2:"{\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/clear @p[tag=ccc] minecraft:emerald 0 1 \"},\"text\":\"出售绿宝石\"}",
Text1:"{\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/scoreboard players tag @p add ccc {SelectedItem:{id:\\\"minecraft:emerald\\\"}}\"},\"text\":\"$$$\"}"
}}
